About.paragraph: LifeLink is a nonprofit organization leading its partners and increasing the number of donated organs, eyes and tissues available to save and heal lives through transplantation while developing a culture where donation is embraced as a fundamental human responsibility.

Testimonials.text: "donating a kidney had made me more aware of my health. Now  I want to eat more healthily or drink less alcohol.In That LifeLink help me out to understand this think."
Testimonials.name: Amit Jain

Testimonials.text: "the experience of donating a organ had been extremely enriching and that I had, quite unexpectedly, gained a lot from it.LifeLink is working very great in that situtaion."
Testimonials.name: Priyanka Sharma

Testimonials.text: "My body has been changed. I have become smart now. I could not work too much before the transplantation, but I do whatever I want without becoming tired.."
Testimonials.name: Katti Dope

Testimonials.text: "I felt that I was young. I was 50 years old, but I felt I was 25 years old after a dicided to donate organs it a very good think i advise all to do that."
Testimonials.name: John Doe

Testimonials.text: "I have positive thoughts and I feel that I am in peace and patiently follow my problems to be solved. I have become quite soft and put aside my anger and deal with my wife pretty well.."
Testimonials.name: Ravi karma

Testimonials.text: "I advised others to think about living donation and organ donation.LifeLink also aware proples to donate organs for others who need it so much."
Testimonials.name: sam mailuer

Contact.address: ICC Trade Tower, Senapati Bapat Rd, Shivajinagar, Pune
